items.sentence: I don\'t know anybody who thinks Tom can do that.
Tom couldn\'t understand why Mary frowned at him.
Tom did better today than he\'s ever done before.
We\'ve been waiting for hours for you to show up.
What I\'m about to say will answer your question.
If Tom doesn\'t eat this, please give it to Mary.
I wonder whether or not this is really necessary.
I wonder why Tom has been so nice to me recently.
How many people do you think are in the audience?
Tom says he\'s climbed this mountain three times.
